title: Compare: Regression highlighting
description: Create the regression list display with clear visual highlighting. Each regression should show case name, scorer, baseline score, candidate score, and delta with emphasis on the severity.
acceptance_criteria: List of regression items sorted by severity (largest delta first)
Each item shows: case name, scorer type
Score comparison: baseline → candidate with arrow
Shows how much threshold is exceeded
Click to navigate to case in run detail (optional)
